WRITING.TEXT: Didn't know what that is, so I looked it up. Yes, exactly that.
And you'll have people fighting against that and saying that it's every person "right" to live forever.

Probably. I mean it could help keep things in check. If they'd found it earlier on, we'd probably have people here going like "it's all bullshit, Jesus never did anything. He's just a cheap magician".
Exactly. And it be a shit way to live too.

WRITING.TITLE: What if scientists find the way to make people immortal but they still age? So you'd expect people as old 9000 years still living.

WRITING.TEXT: I'm done for the day. There's only so much stupid I can handle one day.
After some shit that happened when I was a kid, I'm paranoid my friends my leave me. And because of my paranoia, I almost lost a friend by asking her too many times if she still is my friend.
